normalized: in the western part of the continent,
amidst the huge nations, which were under the rule of the humans, lay our concealed kingdom── vlad.
it was an insignificant kingdom in the eyes of the people.
it was a kingdom of the vampires, which was governed by the ruler of all vampires, cara cromwell.
there resided the people of the night, who were quite similar to humans in form, however, they were a higher form of life, who had transcended well beyond humanity.
even though it was a small kingdom, humans hadn't been allowed entry past its borders for ages.
no, it was actually a means to safeguard them from facing off against vampires, because of the great abilities that we possessed.
we would stop maturing after reaching a certain age of adulthood and wouldn't age beyond that.
we were creatures who could live for an eternity, much longer than any ordinary human.
not to mention, we possessed superhuman strength, which was several times more than any human, and our regenerative powers were such that we could heal a small cut in an instant.
moreover, everyone was free to use their special abilities, which only a small number of exceptional humans had been granted access to.
we had the ability to transform our bodies into weapons and shields, or even into ferocious beasts.
it was possible for us to acquire mastery over sorcery, which was known as black magic amongst the humans, using which we could transform them into our puppets.
there were even some among us who were capable of moving around instantaneously, by transforming their bodies into mist in order to pass through obstacles.
and then, there was our fearful ability, which was the most threatening one for humans, where we would assault them and suck on their lifeblood.
as a result, the humans had been clashing with us repeatedly for ages.
in that era, vampires would infiltrate the human kingdoms and abduct humans before dragging them back into our kingdom against their will, in order to suck on their lifeblood.
as a result, the humans had grown so fearful of our mere existence that they had planned a massive invasion, in order to destroy our entire kingdom.
when our ruler of that era received that information, he sent one of his assassin knights into the human kingdoms.
that person had managed to assassinate all the military leaders of the humans, all alone.
moreover, that operation had been carried out in the space of one mere night.
there had been several such instances, where we would face off against large groups of humans, despite being overwhelmingly outnumbered ourselves.
however, that era of chaos had come to an end in recent times.
the late king, and cara's father, was a coward, who wished to co-exist with humans in harmony.
co-exist with the humans and develop an alliance with them── he had continued spouting such nonsense.
and soon, he ended up establishing that bloody annoying treaty with the humans.
since then, managing my business of human trafficking, while selling our vampiric blood to them, had become more and more challenging, day after day.
i had gathered up those of us who were displeased at the lack of humans to suck blood from, and i had started an organization with these like-minded individuals.
our objective was to create a dark society, where the vampires would rule over the humans.
however, cara was still our current ruler…
that day, the darkness had descended.
it was the time of the people who revelled in the night.
my mansion was no exception, as my subordinates went about conducting their "work".
young women had been stripped naked and their limbs had been bound in shackles, as they stood in front me while trembling uncontrollably.

name: woman 1
normalized: why… are you committing… this cruel act…?

name: woman 2
normalized: please… let me go home…

name: gram
normalized: all of you have been sold off by those very humans.
to us, vampires.

name: woman 3
normalized: t-that is… uh… uhuu, uhuhuu…
i had bought these women from some humans.
they were going to be trained in this mansion to be meat-slaves, before being sold off to the vampires who desired them, similar to any livestock.
as compensation, we had sold our vampiric blood── amrita, to those humans.

name: gram
normalized: hey!
take these sluts away.
don't forget to inject them with amrita, as usual.

name: subordinate
normalized: yeah.
our blood had the effect of stimulating an intense sexual arousal,
quite similar to aphrodisiacs.
its other effect was that it would suppress aging and preserve youth eternally, if injected repeatedly.
which is why, it was known as amrita.
it was said to have originated in the mythological ages, as a legendary drink which bestowed immortality on the person who consumed it, which was actually the blood of us, vampires.

name: vampiress
normalized: i am… of the same race as you!
am i not a vampire just like you!?
then, why…!?

name: gram
normalized: there has been an increasing demand for meat-slave vampires recently.
especially from humans.
it is probably because our bodies don't break, despite being subjected to an excessive amount of abuse.

name: gram
normalized: for instance, it is possible to rip our limbs off.

name: vampiress
normalized: no… no way!
humans would never do such a thing!

name: gram
normalized: unfortunately for you, such a market does exist in this business.
yes.
this was my business.

name: gram
normalized: inject this woman with parasite.

name: vampiress
normalized: stop it!
anyway, that blood doesn't work on anyone of our same race!

name: gram
normalized: be rest assured.
it is nothing like amrita at all.
it is an exceedingly potent aphrodisiac produced by a parasitic bug.
and that aphrodisiac is so irresistible that it is used especially for the training of vampires.

name: vampiress
normalized: hii…!?
the lively woman, who belonged to the same race as mine, raised a scream before falling completely silent, as she was led away by my subordinate to the basement.
in the era of chaos, there had been no need to conceal anyone by confining them to the basement like this.

name: gram
normalized: damn that annoying treaty!

name: gram
normalized: what!?
the emergency sirens echoed out.
i picked up the communications-device, while having a bad feeling about it.

name: gram
normalized: what is it!?

name: subordinate
normalized: an assault by the royal family!

name: gram
normalized: kuh…!
had they finally come here?
even though they had forcibly conducted repeated probes on me so far, i had managed to give them the slip and escape every time until now.
i hadn't expected them to actually target my mansion, since i was a member of the royal family as well.
were they carrying out a pre-emptive strike in order to crush my organization, as it was infamous for violating the treaty?

name: gram
normalized: hey!
how large is their unit…!?
ngh!?
hey!
his response had been cut short.
instead──

name: marika
normalized: i am all alone.

name: gram
normalized: wha!?
the assailant was already inside the room.
a dark-brown woman had appeared out of thin air.

name: gram
normalized: marika krishna, huh…!?
the assassin under the command of the queen, who was also feared as the grim reaper, had come forth.
i pushed the emergency button on the communications-device immediately.

name: marika
normalized: brace yourself.
the grim reaper whispered that without even moving her eyebrows, before disappearing.
she sliced the heads off of six of my subordinates instantly, who had all become dumbfounded due to the sudden appearance of the woman.
all i could see was marika's after-image and the sparks being given off by her chainsaw, which was named shiva after the god of destruction.

name: gram
normalized: damn it!
i realized that i was her next target.
i grabbed a hold of one of my subordinates next to me, who had become bewildered at this turn of events, and used him like a meat-shield.

name: subordinate
normalized: uwaah!?

name: gram
normalized: guh…!?

name: marika
normalized: tch
i was fortunate for my subordinate, as he stretched his arm out and swiped out at marika with his claws in a panic.
even though my subordinate had attacked her neck while acting as my shield, she obliterated him, and even managed to wound my chest by slashing through him.
i was left in a state where i was unable to even swipe out at her using my claws.
however, i had been presented with the perfect opportunity amidst all this chaos.

name: gram
normalized: you should have braced yourself first, you impertinent grim reaper!
i forged a sword in my hand and drove it through my subordinate, in order to stab marika.

name: marika
normalized: fuh!
the grim reaper twisted her body gracefully and dodged my sword, which had been thrust at her through the abdomen of my subordinate who i had used as a meat-shield.

name: gram
normalized: this proves that you can't disappear while dodging!

name: marika
normalized: aha!?
i had hurled a syringe at the grim reaper with all my strength and she was unable to dodge it.

name: marika
normalized: kuh…!?
she swiped her hand hurriedly and removed the syringe, which had gotten stuck in her arm.

name: marika
normalized: … what did you do… just now?
marika glared at me with an agonized expression on her face, as if she had started feeling the change in her body already.

name: gram
normalized: hmph!
kukukuku… what i have done is poison you.
after all, even vampires can be killed in this manner…

name: marika
normalized: so, you even deal in such things, despite partaking in illegal trafficking.

name: gram
normalized: obviously… you lot have been assaulting me repeatedly for quite a while now.
there was no way that i wasn't going to consider some countermeasures against you bastards now, was i…?
i regenerated my heart immediately, unlike any ordinary vampire, while talking to her nonchalantly.

name: cara
normalized: it doesn't matter how many countermeasures you come up with against us.
you can't escape from us, uncle.

name: gram
normalized: hngh!?
another woman descended down in there, with her elegant mantle fluttering behind her.
she was a beautiful woman, with a shiny circlet resting over her brow.

name: cara
normalized: this is as far as your plans go.

name: gram
normalized: cara!
has the queen come here herself…!?

name: cara
normalized: even though you might not be the rightful heir to the throne, you are still a member of the royal family who has disturbed the order.
i was left with no choice but to move against you.

name: gram
normalized: damn it…
how could this be…?
the fact that the queen would move around the kingdom like this was nothing but hearsay amongst its people.
had she come all the way here to crush me?

name: cara
normalized: what you have been doing here is a grave violation of the treaty.

name: gram
normalized: shut up!
isn't it a disgrace that vampires can't suck on the lifeblood of humans anymore!?
such treaties be damned!

name: gram
normalized: sucking on the lifeblood of humans is our one desire!
sucking on blood is what defines a vampire after all!

name: gram
normalized: despite that, vampires are forbidden from assaulting humans!?
are you suggesting that, as our ruler, you have cast away the practice of sucking on blood!?
don't make me laugh!

name: gram
normalized: denying us from sucking on blood is the same as denying our very existence!

name: cara
normalized: while that might be the case, do you really think that you are within your rights to play with the lives of humans and of our own fellow countrymen?

even though it was painful for me to laugh due to the wound on my chest, i couldn't help myself after listening to the queen talk like that in an extremely articulate manner, while staring at me pointedly.

name: gram
normalized: fufufu… giving people what they want and getting what i want, as compensation, is the very basis of a business.

name: gram
normalized: in my case, you could say that it is the blood of humans, as compensation for that of our own race.

name: cara
normalized: don't you feel anything while selling the blood of our noble countrymen?

name: gram
normalized: vampires who don't suck on the lifeblood of humans anymore are no countrymen of mine.

name: cara
normalized: well then, i hope that you are ready.

name: marika
normalized: fuh
the impaired grim reaper disappeared.

name: gram
normalized: uguuh!?
how can you still move!?
she grabbed a hold of my body.

name: cara
normalized: at least, you will be dispatched by my hand.

name: gram
normalized: hmph!
you fool.
this is what i had planned for from the very──

name: gram
normalized: oh… goh… guuh…
all i saw was the blade of a black spear.
she hadn't even let me finish, as my head tumbled down to the floor after being sliced off.

name: marika
normalized: haa… haa… kuh… ukuh…

name: cara
normalized: marika!?
cara grabbed a hold of marika, just as she was about to fall over.
the assassin, known as the grim reaper, had already passed her limit.

name: cara
normalized: what is the matter, marika!?

name: marika
normalized: it seems like… i have been injected with a deadly poison… please excuse me.
it is already too late to save me now…

name: cara
normalized: what are you saying!?
just hold on!
the spreading fire had finally reached all the way here.
as a result, it was bound to be difficult for them to continue their investigation now.
there were numerous things within this mansion which i didn't want them to discover.

name: cara
normalized: uhaa… you have been hit.
i noticed the queen bite her lips in vexation, causing laughter to well up in my heart.
however, i was unable to control the expression on my own face now.
the raging fire was spreading across the surroundings.
the entire room was being swallowed up by that fire, which was undulating like surging waves while giving off rumbling sounds.
it was devouring everything in its path, like a hungry beast satiating its belly.

name: cara
normalized: farewell, uncle.
cara looked at my rolling head with disparaging eyes once more, before retreating while holding marika in her arms.
she left me behind in the blazing inferno, with my blood smeared all over the floor.
however, just as i was about to be swallowed up by that massive inferno,
i began to manipulate my blood, which was streaming out of my torso with sloshing sounds.
my blood began to congeal, while giving off a bizarre screeching sound.
i forged the crimson-coloured fluid into the shape of a hand.
and then, i grabbed a hold of my head with it, before drawing it towards me.
i screwed my head into my torso, as if i was inserting it into a mannequin.

name: gram
normalized: … kuh… kukukuku…
with that done, i was able to laugh properly this time.
i was in front of the door to the director's office.
i swung my head from side to side in order to crack my neck, causing a popping sound to echo out.
and then, i gently stroked my neck, at the back and under my chin, with the palms of my hands,
in order to confirm that everything was alright.

name: cara
normalized: did something happen to your neck, yoshiki?

name: yamakawa
normalized: ah, no.
i am just a bit nervous to meet the director.

name: cara
normalized: fufu… is kitae so difficult to deal with?

name: yamakawa
normalized: that isn't the case at all!
the director is an extremely wonderful person.

name: cara
normalized: mhmm.
kitae is a wonderful person indeed.
fufufu

name: yamakawa
normalized: hah, hahaha…
an awkward expression came up on my face, entirely like someone who didn't know how to react to a beautiful woman smiling happily.
i looked at the other beautiful woman by her side, as if imploring her to help me out.

name: marika
normalized: what is it?

name: yamakawa
normalized: n-no… nothing at all…
it was a personality trait of mine where i would get nervous when surrounded by unfamiliar women, especially when they were so beautiful.
as a result, i had kept a stern face throughout, while guiding the queen and her escort to the director's office on professor kamimura's request.

name: yamakawa
normalized: anyway… let us enter, shall we?
i knocked on the door.
a spirit-barrier, in the shape of a small pentagram, had been carved into it.

name: kitae
normalized: come on in.

name: yamakawa
normalized: excuse me.

name: yamakawa
normalized: ugh…?
what was that?
i experienced a slightly discomforting feeling.
it was quite small, just like the feeling one gets when stung by a mosquito, and i wouldn't even have perceived it had i not been conscious.

name: cara
normalized: sorry to disturb you, kitae.

name: marika
normalized: excuse me.

name: kitae
normalized: welcome, cara, marika.
the barrier-master, uehara, who was also the director of this school, was waiting in the director's office accompanied by kamimura, who also doubled as the hunter.
it seemed like she had smoked a cigarette just a while back, as the overwhelming stench of its smoke was wafting through the atmosphere inside the room, causing my throat to throb.
i looked over anxiously at the heap inside the ashtray, which had been placed on top of the desk.
wine bottles had been placed beside it as well.

name: azuma
normalized: morning.
i appreciate your efforts, professor yamakawa.

name: yamakawa
normalized: it really wasn't a big deal to carry out this task of yours, professor kamimura.

name: azuma
normalized: hehe… guiding two women around the place is a nice perk, isn't it?

name: yamakawa
normalized: hahaha… well, it is.
even though i had already gotten used to talking with professor kamimura by now, our conversation broke down since she was a beautiful woman as well.

name: kitae
normalized: uun…

name: cara
normalized: what is it with your eyes?
the director was looking over the body of the queen of the vampires, as if she was checking her out.

name: kitae
normalized: haa…

name: cara
normalized: is this the time to sigh?
isn't it rude to greet a friend like this, especially after such a long time?

name: kitae
normalized: i didn't get a proper look at you yesterday as it was really dark, however, after looking over you again i can't help but loathe the fact that i am an ordinary woman.
you haven't aged a day, ever since i was but a child.

name: cara
normalized: kitae, you are at an age which is a wonderful time for humans, aren't you?
even though your figure isn't as youthful as it was once, you still look extremely beautiful.
are you sure that you aren't consuming amrita as well?

name: yamakawa
normalized: e-excuse me for a moment.
i ended up interrupting the conversation between the queen and the director instinctively.

name: yamakawa
normalized: as the director, you aren't supposed to be in possession of the drug that is amrita──

name: azuma
normalized: oh my, professor yamakawa!

name: azuma
normalized: both of them are just messing around with each other.
they're old friends.
professor kamimura gave me a wry smile, before clapping me on my back painfully.

name: kitae
normalized: it is as you say, professor yamakawa.
i would sooner transform into a vampire myself, rather than even attempt to get my hands on that drug.

name: cara
normalized: you just might transform into one, despite your wishes.
the queen and the director were unable to bear it anymore and burst into laughter, while staring at each other's face.

name: azuma
normalized: see?

name: yamakawa
normalized: … that does seem to be the case.

name: marika
normalized: haa… miss cara…
her reserved escort sighed lamentably, before covering her face with the palm of her hand.

name: kitae
normalized: even though you are the queen, your mouth is as brazen as always.

name: cara
normalized: it is alright, as long as it is with you, kitae.

name: kitae
normalized: you are blurting out such things despite being in front of a man.
as the queen, you have to produce offspring as well, don't you?
in that case, aren't you worried that no man may court you?

name: cara
normalized: i will bind myself to some man soon!

name: kitae
normalized: you are so carefree… as the queen, it is your responsibility to find a good man for yourself and bind your souls together, isn't it?

name: marika
normalized: uuh…
the dark-brown beauty, who was escorting her, cast her eyes down for some reason.
as i looked over her face, i got the impression that she was troubled by something.

name: azuma
normalized: say… what does binding a soul mean?

name: yamakawa
normalized: oh!
well, that is──
the rulers of vampires were bestowed with the ability to bind their souls to others, unlike other ordinary vampires.
they could only choose one person in their entire life to be their eternal partners.
and that way, they would be able to live their lives together forever, as well as produce offspring together with their eternal partners to be their heirs.
as a result, a member of the opposite sex had to be chosen for this ritual.
the person who was chosen as the partner, would devote the body, the mind and the literal soul to them.
that partner would acquire an immortal body, after devoting the soul, and love and protect the ruler forevermore.
however, if the ruler died, then so would the partner.

name: azuma
normalized: haa… so, that's how it is!
say, professor yamakawa is really knowledgeable, isn't he!?
she clapped my back again.

name: yamakawa
normalized: … that hurts.

name: azuma
normalized: still, is there any man befitting miss queen?
it's going to be extremely difficult for you to find someone worthwhile.

professor kamimura had a somewhat relieved expression on her face, as if she was satisfied with the knowledge that the queen of the vampires, who would be living much longer than the director, hadn't found a partner yet.

name: kitae
normalized: well, that is the story of cara's life.
let me formally introduce her to you once again, professor yamakawa.

name: yamakawa
normalized: ah… yes, director.

name: marika
normalized: fuuh…
i noticed the dark-brown beauty let out a sigh, as if she was relieved that that particular topic had been interrupted.

name: kitae
normalized: my friend, and the ruler of the vampiric kingdom of vlad.
her majesty, the queen cara cromwell.

name: yamakawa
normalized: once again, i am yamakawa yoshiki.
i look forward to working with you, your majesty, the queen.
uh, umm… am i supposed to kneel in this situation?

name: cara
normalized: fufu… that won't be necessary.
henceforth, it will do just fine if you simply refer to me as cara.
you have my regards, yoshiki.

name: kitae
normalized: and that is the knight under the command of the queen, and her escort, marika krishna.

name: marika
normalized: nice to meet you.

name: yamakawa
normalized: it is nice to meet you too.
i am looking forward to working with you.
once the introductions were out of the way, the director changed her demeanour and adopted a sterner appearance.

name: kitae
normalized: now to the real issue at hand.
as professor yamakawa already knows── currently, the illegal dealings between the humans and the vampires have been rampant.

name: yamakawa
normalized: … yes.

name: kitae
normalized: humans are being sold off to vampires in exchange for vampiric blood, which is like a drug to us.
crimes related to the trading of amrita are a frequent occurrence now.
amrita was an aphrodisiac for humans and also had the effect of suppressing aging.
however, if it wasn't administered on a daily basis by humans, then its withdrawal symptoms would manifest, which were similar to those from drugs.
to make matters worse, it had a terrible side-effect.
if a person was already too old, then the body would disintegrate before long.
as a result, there were numerous disputes and crimes involving amrita, even though it led to debilitating consequences for a person's health.

name: cara
normalized: many victims have already fallen prey to it, while we have been watching it all transpire silently.
both, from our side of the vampires and your side of the humans.

name: kitae
normalized: as a result, humans and vampires have joined hands now, in order to sever the trading of the illegal organizations and contain the occurrence of such crimes.

name: cara
normalized: i will be conducting negotiations in japan regarding this particular issue.

name: yamakawa
normalized: so, that is the reason why the queen cara has come to meet the director.
i knew of the fact that the director's grandfather had served as the liaison between the two races during the first-ever negotiations, and assisted in reconciling with the vampires of the time.
it seemed like the uehara family and the royal family had developed and maintained relations since then and, as a result, the director and the queen had developed a friendship.
moreover, the director was the only one in the entire world who could conjure perfect anti-vampire barriers.
the director was the one who was directly responsible for japan being the leading nation, when it came to opposing vampires.
obviously, there was a spirit-barrier bordering hayato academy as well.
it was a massive dragon-seal barrier, created by placing five dragons in the shape of a pentagram.
hayato academy had been completely quarantined from the threat of the vampires.

name: yamakawa
normalized: well, what about the queen cara…?

name: kitae
normalized: yes.
it is possible for her to pass through it with my seal of approval.
i had heard of certain exceptional spirit-barriers, which could allow vampires to pass through them.
any vampire could pass through the spirit-barrier around hayato academy, if given the seal of approval by the director.
a vampire, who had been bestowed with her approval, would be able to pass through her spirit-barrier without any resistance, just like any other human.

name: kitae
normalized: it is for this reason that we are protecting cara and marika in here, until the negotiations.

name: azuma
normalized: and that's why professor yamakawa and i will be taking the trouble to watch over the both of you.

name: marika
normalized: … trouble?
the dark-brown knight glared at professor kamimura pointedly.

name: kitae
normalized: fortunately, our school is a boarding school.
all the teaching staff, including the professors, have their own dormitory to stay the night, including one for visitors such as traders and the like.

name: kitae
normalized: moreover, i believe that you won't be coming across any unfriendly eyes here, since any invasions by the vampires seem to have become almost non-existent now.

name: kitae
normalized: however, i do believe that you will require various kinds of assistance, as you will be living in such a place for the very first time.

name: cara
normalized: even after all this chatting, you didn't get caught up in it.
i am truly glad that you are doing your job with all your heart.
as a result, you have compelled me to say yes.

name: kitae
normalized: fufufu
the director broadened her bold smile even more, after being complimented by the queen.
moreover, her glasses were shining brilliantly as well.

name: yamakawa
normalized: as one would expect of the director.
however… if there is anything that i can do, then allow me to assist you as well.

name: azuma
normalized: indeed, me too.
after all, i can't refuse the director's request now, can i?

name: cara
normalized: azuma and yoshiki, please do me that favour.

name: marika
normalized: please treat with miss cara properly.
i don't want her to go missing again.

name: cara
normalized: come now, marika.
i am not going to be careless here.

name: marika
normalized: … yes…
she responded, as if she wasn't completely convinced by her.

name: cara
normalized: anyway, it is much safer here than on the outside due to your blessed barrier, kitae.
even so, i believe that the chances of something dangerous transpiring at this school is much higher than usual now.

name: kitae
normalized: … like the thing that happened yesterday?
everyone, who had gathered here, made grim faces.

name: cara
normalized: the illegal organization, on our side of the vampires, has already made its move.

name: marika
normalized: a diplomat was on his way to japan, however, he tampered with the information that miss cara is here and let it leak out.

name: yamakawa
normalized: … does that mean that there is a chance of some of his collaborators being in japan?
nobody even nodded to my question, however, the expressions on their faces made it abundantly clear.

name: cara
normalized: kitae, may i request you to carry out an investigation of the surrounding areas?

name: marika
normalized: we can't be too careful.
even though she was the queen, she couldn't venture into the surrounding human-dominated regions for the purpose of carrying out investigations.
it was due to the non-aggression clause in the treaty.

name: kitae
normalized: i understand.
just leave it to me.
it will be possible to make the negotiations a success, if we can just manage to eradicate such shady behind-the-scenes dealings.

name: cara
normalized: and strengthen our alliance once again, in the process.

name: kitae
normalized: yes.
it will certainly be a success.

name: cara & kitae
normalized: and so too will be our era.
the voices of the director and the queen coincided.

name: kitae
normalized: so, how about to the dawn of success?
the director pointed her fingertip to the big wine cabinet, which was used for business dealings.
it was completely loaded with wine bottles.

name: kitae
normalized: i was really surprised when you had all this delivered here.

name: cara
normalized: it was for a celebratory toast after the negotiations.
i chose pretty good wine for it.

name: azuma
normalized: what!?
do you intend to use such an expensive and delicious wine just for a celebratory toast…?
she dropped her shoulders and let out a deep sigh, as if she had become crestfallen.

name: marika
normalized: how childish.

name: azuma

normalized: i am amazed.

name: yamakawa
normalized: i see.

i had noticed that the attitude of the students towards her had been different in the morning, compared to the afternoon.
in the morning, everyone had been really nervous, while cara was standing on the platform.

especially after they had come to realize that the person, who was standing in front of their eyes, was the ruler of a race of beings known for being the predators of humankind, and that they would be dealing with her henceforth.
the students had expected her to be intimidating, as even the teachers with combat experience were mindful around her.
after all, she could suck on their blood quite easily.
as a result, professor cara had told them about the fact that she didn't suck on blood, and then displayed it by backing up her words with her actions.

name: cara
normalized: after that, they became a bit relaxed.

normalized: i had assumed that it would take more time, however, i am relieved.

normalized: well then, i'll be on my way.

name: yamakawa
normalized: you appreciate my efforts… do you?

i realized that my mouth had been left open, after i had said that.

name: yamakawa
normalized: now then…
the teachers' dormitory, for which the three beautiful women had left just now, was within the school's premises, as well as the boundary of the spirit-barrier.
however, it was located in a place which was slightly isolated from the school building.
it was in such a place that even if someone raised a scream within the school building, no one would be able to hear it over there.
however, it was quite a good place to conduct one's work.

name: yamakawa
normalized: i still have to finish up the remainder of my work for the day.
an involuntary smile appeared on my face.
and soon, the day turned to dark.
i had been looking forward to this moment.
i had acquired yamakawa yoshiki's body, after having cast away my original body, which had been chopped up into minced meat.
i had adopted this man's memories, his mannerisms and even his speech since then, while leaving no traces of my former self.
i had completely restrained my own abilities.
i looked up at the sky from a window within the corridor.

name: yamakawa
normalized: it is a wonderful night, isn't it?
indeed, it was.
enough to make me remember yesterday night's tragic events.
it was the time when the pale-blue light of the moon had been shining faintly.
it was the time of the people who revelled in the night.
it was the time when we were able to fully demonstrate our vampiric abilities.

name: yamakawa
normalized: now, it is time to attend to the remainder of my work for the day.
i was standing in front of the director's office.
to begin with, i would have to deal with the most annoying problem.
the spirit-barrier, that uehara kitae had conjured.
so long as it was working properly, i would have to continue to restrain my abilities.
under the current circumstances, i would be in danger if i tried to get to cara, who was my final objective.
in order to get to her, i needed to break through both, marika and kamimura the hunter.
there was no chance of me emerging victorious, if i didn't get my subordinates in here.
and in order to do that, it was necessary to tamper with the spirit-barrier, without anyone noticing a thing.
that was the reason why i had come here── in front of the director's office.
in order to ensnare the barrier-master, uehara kitae.

name: yamakawa
normalized: excellent.
